name: additional_title_details
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ott_details.
Tool description: Get Streaming details of Movie and TV Shows. We support 150+ Streaming platforms in US and India such as HBO, YouTube, Netflix , Primve Video, Hotstar, Hulu, etc . (use our OTT Providers endpoint to get the full list OTT providers we support) . In additon to streaming info we also provide basic details on any given movie title. 
API description: Get  additional details for a movie or tv show like reviews  , quotes , plotsummary , number of votes , trailer url  , cast details etc.

imdbid.description: The IMDb ID of the movie or TV show.
